title: [1508521049] Rohan Dennis' BMC Timemachine 01 | Vuelta A España 2017
description:
A proven winner, this the time trial bike belonging to BMC Racing Team's Rohan Dennis' that put him into the red jersey at this year's Vuelta A España. Join Lloydy as he takes a tour around this impressive ride.

Let us know what you think of this bike in the comments below

asset.title: Rohan Dennis' BMC Timemachine 01 | Vuelta A España 2017
asset.description:
A proven winner, this the time trial bike belonging to BMC Racing Team's Rohan Dennis' that put him into the red jersey at this year's Vuelta A España. Join Lloydy as he takes a tour around this impressive ride. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/o9
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/oa

Let us know what you think of this bike in the comments below 👇

Australian Time Trial Champion Rohan Dennis has a formidable record when it comes to his time trialling ability. Join former Tour de France pro Dan Lloyd as he takes a look over this sleek BMC Racing Team TT bike. 

Frame and forks: BMC Timemachine 01
Wheels: Pro Textreme Disc and Tri Spoke
Tyres: Vittoria Speed 25mm Tubulars
Handlebars: 3T TT bars
Saddle: Fi'zi:k Ares
Brakes: Shimano Dura-Ace
Front Mech: Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 9070
Rear Mech: Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 9070
Chainset: Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 9070
Pedals: Shimano Dura-Ace
Chainring size: 56-44
Powermeter: SRM 
Cassette: 11-28

Saddle height: 78cm
Tyre width: 25mm

Finishing touches: Sandpaper grippers on bar extensions, rubber ring to prevent valve rattle on carbon wheels, tubes used on TT bar stack to tidy cables.

What do you think of this race-winning bike? Let us know below! 

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/o8

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!
